title: SmartConvert v1.7 Final By bobiras2009
description:
By bobiras2009		



If you appreciate my work you can leave a commnent and seed this for as long you can to help me upload more.


Requirements: Android 2.2+
Overview: SmartConvert is the next generation in mobile conversion tools. It is the absolute unit converter available on the market. Straight, simple and highly effective, Smart Convert will convert almost any unit type imaginable with over 1200 units divided in over 70 categories. All conversions are made offline, no network access required. 

The next generation in mobile conversion tools has arrived!!

SmartConvert is the next generation in mobile conversion tools. It is the absolute unit converter available on the market. Straight, simple and highly effective, Smart Convert will convert almost any unit type imaginable with over 1200 units divided in over 70 categories. All conversions are made offline, no network access required.

This is THE must have conversion tool and reference for engineers, scientists and students.
